content:
uweigand commented on issue #5196:

I _do_ think we should require one of big or little when lane-count differs, as you suggest; otherwise this is a new way that endian-specific behavior is visible in CLIF, which I'd prefer to avoid. Happy to r+ once that is added!

Ok, implemented. There were four filetests where the error triggered, which I fixed by adding a byte order specifier. Thanks!
